organization.description:
Abriendo Puertas, has been serving our communities for 18 years providing human and social services in the following areas:

Child and Youth Development After School and Summer Program in East Little Havana and in North Miami Beach offering academic reinforcement in reading/literacy,social skills, physical fitness, karate and dance

Abriendo Puertas ha estado sirviendo a nuestras comunidades por 18 a+u00a6os proporcionando servicios humanos y sociales en las siguientes areas:

Child and Youth Development After School and Summer Program( Programas de desarrollo de verano y despu+u00acs de clases para ni+u00a6os y j+u00a6venes) ofrece resfuerzo acad+u00acmico en el este de la Peque+u00a6a Havana y en North Miami Beach en lectura/alfabetizaci+u00a6n, habilidades sociales, aptitud f+u00a1sica, karate y dance.
organization.name: ABRIENDO PUERTAS, INC.
